remarks: The negative function of the ring of power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
psrgrp.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrgrp.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
psrgrp.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Grp ) $.
psrneg.d $e |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } $.
psrneg.i $e |- N = ( invg ` R ) $.
psrneg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrneg.m $e |- M = ( invg ` S ) $.
psrneg.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psrneg $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` X ) = ( N o. X ) ) $.
$d I f $.
